name: Housing Support Service
description: Casa Quezada: a 52-unit long-term housing facility, managed in collaboration with Dolores Street Community Services and the SFDPH Direct Access to Housing Program. MNRC provides Case management and behavioral health services to tenants of Casa Quezada. MNRC also provides outreach and case management services to SRO tenants in the Mission, as part of the Mission SRO Collaborative.

howToGetIt: Call for more information: Telephone number (415) 869-7977 or visit Resource Center at 165 Capp Street, San Francisco, CA 94110 Capacity is limited.
keywords: our family is experiencing homelessness and i need subsidies
i am over 24 years old without children.
